title: Leading IPOs in the U.S. 2019
yAxis: Deal size in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Company (Offer date), and a y axis representing Deal size in million U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Uber_Technologies_(May_9) where Deal size in million U.S. dollars is 8100.0.
The lowest category is found at DouYu_International_Holdings_(Jul_16) where Deal size in million U.S. dollars is 775.0.
gold: Uber Technologies went public on May 9 , 2019 . This was the largest initial public offering ( IPO ) in the United States in 2019 , raising 8.1 billion U.S. dollars . As shown in this statistic , the ten largest IPOs that year each raised over a billion dollars in capital .
